=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Watermark Sweet Heart Eau De Parfum For Women 3.4 Oz, Inspired By Pink All My Heart
Review Date: 2020/09/30
Store: Watermark Beauty
Product Description: ['Sweet Heart Perfume By Watermark Beauty.', 'If you got it, flaunt it!', "If you feel the love in the air, it's time to show it to the world! With this exquisite sweet fragrance inspired by Pink All My Heart you can express what your heart feels even without words. This lovely perfume will help you feel amazing and attractive every time you go hand in hand with the loved one. The refreshing mix of perfume, demineralized water and essential oils will ensure that this romantic aroma will last so you can enjoy those special moments. (Note: When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you. For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear. Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied)", 'Made by Watermark Beauty. To ensure Great customers satisfaction this product Essential Oils was manufactured in the UK.', 'Eau De Parfum Spray Women 3.4 Fl. Oz./100 Ml. The product is inspired by Pink All My Heart. Packaging for this product may vary from that shown in the image above.', 'Ingredients: Product contains 80% alcohol grade 40-B, parfum, aqua, (demineralizad water)', 'Essential Oils Made in UK']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Watermark Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Fragrance Concentration': 'eau_de_parfum', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 7 inches; 9.92 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SC1007', 'UPC': '713807393021'}

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Colorful and Trendy Items:** The individual shows a strong preference for colorful and aesthetically pleasing products, as seen in the purchase of vibrant sleep caps and accessories.

- **Beauty and Self-Care Products:** A significant focus on beauty and self-care, indicated by the frequent buying of perfumes and cosmetics, with a particular affinity for fragrances rated highly, suggesting the importance of scent in personal care routines.

- **Quality Concerns:** There's a noticeable trend of disappointment with product quality and sizing, particularly regarding items like hair accessories and wigs, where expectations do not match reality.

- **Gifts and Accessories:** The purchases indicate a penchant for fashionable accessories, including hair items, emphasizing a love for accessories that add to personal style.

- **Mixed Reviews on Functionality:** Products often receive mixed reviews regarding functionality and comfort, specifically with items like sleep caps and vibrators, reflecting an emphasis on usability alongside aesthetics.

- **Long-term Favorites:** Certain products, such as an eyebrow pencil, indicate brand loyalty and satisfaction, suggesting a preference for reliable beauty essentials.

Overall, this person's shopping history illustrates a love for stylish, colorful beauty and fashion items, paired with a critical eye on product quality and performance.
